DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the gastrointestinal tolerability of an investigational drug to an approved drug in the treatment of osteoarthritis during one year treatment period.
DOC.brief_title: Investigational Drug Versus an Approved Drug in Patients With Osteoarthritis (0663-061)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 12 months.
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis of the knee, hip, hand or spine which requires the use of medications for pain relief Known allergies to the study drugs
